repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
Picked from #7080.

This contains only a single bug fix. Otherwise it  changes the interface of the module state table so they can be created independently (and not just as static variables in a Cython module) which allows them to be tested just as a pure table (independent of interpreters and modules).

comment_data.body: Bugfix is here - the last element didn't get cleared when removing a module

commit.message: Make module state lookup testable independently
